scripts.docs:rust: cargo doc -p jet-margin -p jet-margin-pool -p jet-margin-swap --no-deps && cp -r ./target/doc/* ./docs/margin-rust
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint && git add .
scripts.test:gui: cd app && yarn e2e:gui && cd ../app-beta && yarn e2e:gui
scripts.start: yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin build && yarn --cwd libraries/ts/bonds build && (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; yarn --cwd libraries/ts/margin watch & yarn --cwd libraries/ts/bonds watch & yarn --cwd app start)
